column4: ok I have cheched the FAQ and I've googled, now I figure it's time to beg for help on IRC :>
does anyone have a synaptic touchpad on a compaq laptop working correctly uner X11?
mmmmmmmmm aqua
i have a synaptic touchpad, but not on a compaq
does tap and scroll work for you?
yeah
could you PM me the pointer section of your xconf?
http://paste.msunix.org/view.php?id=1237
acpi has been modified quite a lot in 2.6.9 maybe you should try it
just did a apt-get update this am
or should I compile from scratch
2.6.9 is not yet in ubuntu
I have the same config you do, just no love
i advise you compiling one from scratch
using make-kpkg
will I have to make a initrd?
if you compile in hard the important options, like your fs and ide support, you won't
i didn't do one for my rc3
look to this page for your acpi pb
hah I got it
what ?
acpi ?
